'''Mythcon 37''' was the thirty-seventh annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "The Map & The Territory: Maps and Landscapes in Fantasy"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Lois McMaster Bujold (fantasy and SF author) and [[Amy H. Sturgis|Amy Sturgis]] (C.S. Lewis and Native American fantasy scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' [[Janet Croft]]
